rationale.message: Please allow push notifications in the next step, so that we can send you a notification when the product is back in stock.

noResult.qrCode: We couldn't find a result for this QR code.

appRating.rejectionApprovalMessage: Would you like to give us feedback? This helps us to improve the app further.
